description: This file is a shell script that configures wireless interfaces, starts/stops hostapd services, manages network bridging, and sets up DHCP and web server configurations for router setup.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service for the 2.4GHz Wi-Fi interface.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd_5G
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service for the 5GHz Wi-Fi interface, including module reloading.

methods.name: Hostapd_Restart
methods.description: Kills existing hostapd processes and restarts the hostapd service for wlan0 interface.
